website_summaries.verdict: Fantastic option for those wanting to measure mental, dietary, and fitness health all in one journal.
pros: Great for users wanting a simpler fitness journal
Includes motivational quotes and universal health tracking
Opens flat when for easy writing
Space provided for weekly review and measuring progress
cons: Not the most detailed health journal available

customer_reviews.title: perfect companion to losing weight and living a healthy life style
customer_reviews.text: Ok first thing i got to say - this journal blew my mind away. 1) The company put in a LOT of thought to make this journal user friendly 2) I didnt realize how useful this journal would be! It literally does all the planning for you - it makes it so easy to be on top of your life to make lifestyle changes. 3) It looks really nice - From the faux leather cover, two bookmarks, an elastic closer, and a pen holder. I love it and would definitely recommend! ~Order this journal - its a life changer~
customer_reviews.author: Mamax4

customer_reviews.title: Food/Fitness Journal for 90 days
customer_reviews.text: I love the layout and the sections for the good journal and daily affirmations and quotes. It’s only for 90 days though - wish I had read that before.
customer_reviews.author: Lunchtimerunner

customer_reviews.title: which is great, the seller followed up with a E-Book guide ...
customer_reviews.text: Since purchasing the Food Journal, I found myself more committed to my health habits. By dedicating a few minutes a day to sit, plan, and schedule my meals it helps me keep my focus and reach my goals. There is something about physically writing things down that makes my goals more attainable. Besides the Journal itself, which is great, the seller followed up with a E-Book guide and helpful recipes that shows their sincere dedication to their vision and product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I love this planner. It’s just what I was looking for to provide a wholistic focus on losing weight. Discrete and professional looking, it doesn’t splash “I’m trying to lose weight” like other journals do. Some of us want to change our lives with quiet confidence. Plenty of room to write... I love the end of week review section where I can reflect on what worked and what didn’t, or where I can improve. Along with my food plan, I lost 5.2 pounds this past week. Planning is the foundation. Life and Apples created a gem. And the ebooks are a wonderful addition. Thank you Life and Apples!
customer_reviews.author: Truthbearer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to compliment your weight loss journey
customer_reviews.text: I really like my journal. I read a book about developing new habits for weight loss and other reversing other negatives in your like and the very first recommendation is journaling! This fits the bill with a “I am grateful for” and “daily affirmation” space to write. I also feel planning meals ahead of time keeps me better focused and on track! I record my food, weight loss, steps, etc daily on online apps. But it is so nice to sit down, pen in hand, and reflect on my upcoming day or at the end of the day. Writing it down is extra motivation and accountability. I actually look forward to that quiet time every day.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cotter

customer_reviews.title: I like the layout and style of the journal
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a few weeks. Its very practical. I usualy write everything i eat and drink in an app, but i also write it down in this journal and it helps to do both. Also writing it with a pen has more of an effect on things. I like the layout and style of the journal. Its well made. Glad i got this to help me track my daily in take.
customer_reviews.author: Ana C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the expecting mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this planner at the start of my third trimester being pregnant. My doctor wanted me to be more mindful of what I eating so that I wouldn't go past the recommended weight gain by the end of my pregnancy. This planner was perfect for that. It helped me keep track of my daily activity (my doctor also wanted me walking every day) and everything I ate for meals and snacks. My weight gain slowed down and I was able to make some really mindful healthy choices that lead to a healthy pregnancy. This planner really drove home the point: What you do today matters. Healthy Mother = Easier Birth = Healthy Happy Baby!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Coolest thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in the mail a couple days ago just opened it up I love it I'm going to order a couple more it's simple but it is detailed you don't sit and write forever it has a little of everything in it I just think it's the coolest thing ever in a few months I can give an update how it actually worked in improving my health and life quality I have some chronic issues pain issues which changing lifestyle will help tremendously which I'm hoping this book will help me with I'll let you know
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: A PERFECT FOOD/FITNESS JOURNAL
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my nutritionist/RD. I love this more than any other food/fitness journal I've purchased. Each day is 2 pages--sections names: I AM GRATEFUL FOR POSITIVE THOUGHTS ACTIVE DAY NOTES TODAY'S MEAL PLAN SCALE of 1-5 UNIVERSAL WELLNESS ELEMENTS (water/nutrients/fun/sleep) It fits in my bag and I carry it around each day I'm away from home.
customer_reviews.author: SaladEatingCat

customer_reviews.title: Briefly: 6 months first then 90 days
customer_reviews.text: Its sturdy Has a lot of space for writing The pages don't bleed through 6 months come at the beginning of the journal then 90 days follow. Has 1 envelope pocket at the back with few stickers 2 ribbon book marks to help separate the months and weeks and notes as one wishes. Happy planning.
customer_reviews.author: Howard's Daughter

customer_reviews.title: A great planner for mental and physical health!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Wellness Planner a few days ago and took time to read through the “Mindset” section (like an Introduction) so I could understand how to use it best. They gave clear examples and reasoning of how to use this planner to my benefit so I started right in and this is going to be a game-changer for me and it was exactly what I was looking for! You can also order an additional Sticker Pack through their website as well as their other 2 planners. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Daytona675

customer_reviews.title: Great journal, unpleasant smell
customer_reviews.text: I just got the journal today. It isn’t like any other I’ve used. Easy layout, makes me think through my goals and each day individually. The only complaint is that it SMELLS! It stinks like really bad soap or a lotion that no one wants. I don’t know if this is on purpose from the seller, but it’s giving me a headache & making me sneeze. That’s why the loss of a star or two. I really hope it airs out!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa L. Onstott

customer_reviews.title: well organized
customer_reviews.text: I love the weekly assessment feature. Plus, the size is perfect--not too small but it'll fit in my purse if I need to transport it. The pages have pertinent prompts that remind me of my goals on a daily basis. I was hesitant to buy this due to the price, but it's been worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Careyon

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: It’s actually been very helpful in keeping me on track, making me plan, and having me reflect on goals and actions. Also, it’s not just about weight and food. It’s about creating positive changes. I’ve been able to improve my eating, I’ve dropped 10 lbs, I’ve increased my activity, I meditate weekly, and I read daily—all of which are goals I’ve been able to track through the journal. It takes work, but the journal makes it user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Bleu5591

customer_reviews.title: Make lifestyle changes
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this journal. I have a tendency to get a little obsessive about food but this allows me to track my progress in a healthy way. I like that the focus is on gratitude and positivity and that there are daily check boxes for air and sunlight, joy and fun, nutrients, sleep, and water. This format lets you set your own goals and there is a weekly recap every 7 days. I’ve really enjoyed using it and I’ve lost 7 pounds and gained a lot of peace!
customer_reviews.author: Manon E Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for addressing multiple areas of wellness!
customer_reviews.text: This journal is very well organized to help you reflect on multiple areas in your wellness journey. Changing my lifestyle to gluten and dairy free, making sure I am addressing all areas of need, and focusing more on things that really matter after cancer surgery have been a challenge. This journal helps to hold me and my husband accountable. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dawna Scott

customer_reviews.title: Water intake and exercise duration
customer_reviews.text: This is my second book of the food and fitness journal, I love the gratitude and positive thought portions. And I look forward to the daily quote. If there's anything I'd change: #1- put 8-10 glass images to mark for every glass of water you drink, and #2- column for exercise duration. I'm on WW (weight watchers) and these two items would help imensly.
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted and more
customer_reviews.text: I love this journal. I was looking for a good, thorough way of keeping track of my diet and exercise and perhaps a motivating tool too. I got all this plus I was also able to get rid of my regular day planner because this journal has plenty of room for daily to-dos, monthly calendars, and lots of pages for open notes. Best journal I've used thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, fabulous Diary
customer_reviews.text: The Diary is a record keeper for me, makes me accountable and serves as a reminder to me and for me. The GRATEFUL and AFFIRMATION Sections are a huge bonus for me. I find it to be quite expensive, however I love the layout of each day. So far the planner has helped me organize my life better as well as losing excess poundage.
customer_reviews.author: Hava Horvitz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love the format of this journal! The journal looks very sturdy although I did just receive it. I'm going to order a second one for the second half of the year.
customer_reviews.author: A Prime Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love this Diary
customer_reviews.text: It has everything I need to track to keep me on program. The pen holder elastic did come out, but I think I can glue it back. I'll be buying another of these when I use this one up.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STARS!
customer_reviews.text: This journal is so easy to use. I usually sit down at the beginning of each week and use it to plan what I will eat, how I will exercise, etc. There is a space for everything in this journal. I have used other journals and they were all lacking something. This Food Journal and Fitness Diary will have you covered from A to Z. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: EstLea

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this product. I had to search around with different planners to find this one that fit what I was looking for. It had spaces to track meals and water, make goals, write down affirmations, etc. I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST MONEY I EVER SPENT WAS ON THESE PLANNER JOURNALS!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Wellness Planner and The Growth Planner are what I was needing !!! I purchased these on Amazon. I watched a review on you tube by Julie Plans and I really loved the layout of the pages and how much thought went into planning these planners. I find they will help keep me focused on my goals, not only now, but in the years to come. I plan on making other purchases from this seller! :) I AM SO EXCITED!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to hold myself accountable. Pages are thick so I can use all my pens and no bleed. I like that it had two book markers, this way I can keep my days and the full calendar marked at the same time and not lose my place. Fun to use and easy to make and break habits. I actually already bought a 2nd one for when this one is used.
customer_reviews.author: Regina S

customer_reviews.title: what's that odor??
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this planner, but it had an odor that would not go away even after airing it out a few days. Would not recommend this to friends
customer_reviews.author: Amy K.

customer_reviews.title: Great health and wellness planner! An asset to a healthy lifestyle!
customer_reviews.text: Love this planner! Exactly what I needed. I’ve been doing a health program for a while and was writing my own notes in a notebook.... this is just what I needed! I’m going to order a few more as gifts for my friends. Beautiful book. Nice quality. Clearly written and precise. Thanks this will definitely help me on my healthy lifestyle goals.
customer_reviews.author: T Joseph

customer_reviews.title: On my 2nd one!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this journal. This is my second one. I like that it has a place for all different types of planning - daily, exercise, food, plus an area for assessment, as well as areas for gratitude. The only improvement I could think of is more blank or lined pages for journaling.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Bartel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Journal
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite journals. It is beautiful inside and out. I also appreciated the free additional content that came with it. (downloads of charts and lists)
customer_reviews.author: D. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have much for weight loss
customer_reviews.text: This journal didn’t really have anything for weight loss (ie a place to track your weight, as well as progress), I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fitness tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool to track your fitness activity and food. Seeing the foods you eat and the impact it has on your body is a great way to adjust your intake for your weight goals. This planner helps you do that. In addition, I track my fitness activities so I can switch things up frequently. This is a great planner with great room to write and look back over time.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Journal
customer_reviews.text: Purchase for my daughters as a summer project to track food and exercise. Nice lay-out and easy o use.
customer_reviews.author: SJP Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: The Life and Apples Wellness Journal is the perfect tool to get me motivated and I hope keep me motivated. There are lots of useful sections on the pages of the journal. Its a handsome book and very well made. May be worth the money, but still costs a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great planner for food intake
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a great planner for has especially if you had any surgeries or if you just want to monitor your food intake.
customer_reviews.author: Yoyo

customer_reviews.title: Is cute and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.text: I love it..is what i was looking for to get motivated my self..❤
customer_reviews.author: Bere

customer_reviews.title: Best food journal I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this food journal. All the small details make it so amazing. I really love filling it out and it makes me stay on track.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love all the features of this journal, but it came with many damages /: the plastic on the outside was already torn open and it looks like water damage as well as something was set on top. I'm very disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Katy Eli

customer_reviews.title: Thorough journal for every aspect of life.
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. It covers all the bases with goal setting, gratefulness, diet, daily activities and more.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cooper

customer_reviews.title: #1 planner for tracking and positive reinforcement
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The only thing I don't like is that it has a 6 month calendar in the front but only enough daily pages for 3 months, this should match. I like the mindset pages for the 1st time purchase but feel they will be a waste of space for future purchases. I love the bookmark and the page ribbons! My favorite planner so far
customer_reviews.author: DeNae

customer_reviews.title: Great for healthy living
customer_reviews.text: I'm a personal trainer and I found this to be the perfect tool for planning and tracking my workouts and my food. I also love the daily inspirational quotes and space to write what I am grateful for every day. The weekly review provides a great way to look back at the success of the week and things I can do better. Rather than feeling bad about the things I didn't accomplish, it allows me to take a closer look and find ways to make the following week better.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved it
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved it at first. havent seen her use it lately. Looks like new year new me fails again
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Log goals... Everything you need...
customer_reviews.text: This tablet includes everything I need... Calenders, food diary, goals, workout/exercise log... And more. So much... So easy... So helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky L. Day

customer_reviews.title: Too thin pages.
customer_reviews.text: The pages are transparent. Not sure how you could even be able to tell what you wrote when because you are probably still going to be seeing it a week later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A positive daily planner that includes fitness, meal planning and goal setting!
customer_reviews.text: I just began using this planner and it's already changed my everyday activities. Planning each morning and reviewing each night holds me accountable. Also provides from long-term goal setting and allows to set the steps and timeline. I'm excited!
customer_reviews.author: Twyla Heslop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Food Tracking System
customer_reviews.text: This is something I made up for me to use the things I would like to see in a food journal. Very nice! I would like a soft cover, but it's still great! A bit much on the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A McCamey

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I like this journal diary. Set up so that it is easy for you to use. Like the ideal of keeping a goal and journaling
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Nothing else like it!
customer_reviews.text: Motivational and easy to adapt to your needs! I particularly was looking for a food/lifestyle journal that was not focused on weight loss but rather just becoming a healthier me. For people trying to lose weight, this would also work well! But for me it works well for simply keeping me accountable for taking care of my body, which has recently not been a priority. This was exactly the kind of journal I needed and trust me I can not find anything as well rounded for a decent price!
customer_reviews.author: skyy

customer_reviews.title: It seems good in theory, but only if it's usable.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have started using this right when I got it so I would have been in the time frame to be able to send it back. I'm sure it would be a great journal, if all of it were usable. The bottom edge of a good amount of the pages are connected so you can't use the pages.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: nice joural
customer_reviews.text: I like the journal. It has many features that are important to me such as the question of "What can I do better tomorrow?" as well as the 1-5 scale of how well i kept to my schedule. I wish that each day there was a page included where I could write some notes.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Contegiacomo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome planner
customer_reviews.text: Awesome planner. I love it. Puts everything at your fingertips.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great Management Tool
customer_reviews.text: I read about this food/lifestyle journal on a website for creating healthy, sustainable habits so decided to order it. It has everything you need to keep track of your daily food intake, exercise, mood, goals, etc. Very well thought out. It covers three months which is perfect otherwise it would have been too large to conveniently carry around. Perfect gift for anyone who wants to journal in a meaningful way.
customer_reviews.author: Molly's Mom

customer_reviews.title: It helps me control of what I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this food Journal to help me control of what I'm eating. I'm writing everything down so I won't forget what I ate. i find it's the best way for me to loss weight. very helpful.

customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for in a daily planner for establishing healthy habits! Easy to use and I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Mays

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organizing health and fitness goals!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this journal for the past 2 weeks and love how it is helping me track my fitness and nutrition goals!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Borg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this journal!! The only thing I would like more is maybe more room to journal things
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but did not receive the e package ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but did not receive the e package portion of the order. Was looking forward to using along with the journal
customer_reviews.author: L. Lyn

customer_reviews.title: A high quality and easy to use Food diary
customer_reviews.text: A high quality and easy to use Food diary. Unlike others, this one has room to write what you ate, or how much you work out and also to mention the equally important issues in your life, like what was good today and what do you need to work on. For me, a diary like this is part of the process of awareness of proper nutrition and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Heni

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I like the planner however it came damaged and it was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Cota2007

customer_reviews.title: I like this planner because it is very discreet
customer_reviews.text: I like this planner because it is very discreet. It look like a diary. I have high blood pressure and IBS. I had to get my Gall Bladder removed so I have to be careful of what I put in my stomach everyday. I do not eat enough fruits and vegetables and this helps me keep track of how much I eat and when I need to eat more.
customer_reviews.author: kenyeta kelly

product_meta.title: Life & Apples Wellness Planner - Food Journal and Fitness Diary with Daily Gratitude and Meal Planner for Healthy Living - Track Weight Loss Diet and Achieve Health Goals - Undated, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

The Wellness Planner by Life & Apples is a motivational journal for healthy living. The planner offers a set of tools and practices developed based on health, diet and positive psychology scientific research.

How many times did you promise yourself you were going to make healthier choices but kept falling back into old habits?

Whether you want a better quality of life, struggle with overweight or unhealthy habits, coping with a physical or mental condition or simply want to get fit and have a healthier lifestyle, you need practical tools for achieving your health and wellness goals.

Get healthier and happier with The Wellness Planner by Life & Apples:

 * Food journal & meal planner for tracking meals and logging food
 * Gratitude journal and daily affirmations
 * Fitness and exercise scheduling
 * Daily to do section for increasing productivity
 * Goal-setting section
 * Weekly goals review
 * Habit tracker
 * Health parameters tracker
 * Monthly calendar (undated)
 * Bonus planner stickers
 * Inspirational quotes
 * Notes pages

Planning is the key to success. Use The Wellness Planner to stay motivated and accountable for making better choices on your journey to health.

Click Add to Cart to get the planner today, and start a healthier, happier life!
feature_bullets: MOTIVATIONAL FOOD JOURNAL -  a guided journal for achieving diet and fitness goals, tracking meals, developing positive habits, eating healthier and feeling happier.
ALL-IN-ONE WELLNESS PLANNER - daily gratitude, food journal, meal planner, workout schedule, diet diary, habit tracker, goal progress review and a monthly calendar layout.

PREMIUM QUALITY - undated 5.5 x 8 inch hardcover notebook, premium 100gsm thick paper, covering 90 days. Made of vegan eco-friendly materials and comes with an elastic pen holder, closure band, planner stickers, 2 bookmarks and a pocket for notes.

BONUSES WITH PURCHASE - get the Healthy Eating & Meal Planning e-package with your purchase. You’ll get a package of ebooks and downloadable printables including a weekly meal planner, healthy recipes, fitness planner and the complete guide to meal planning.

DAILY PRACTICE SYSTEM GUARANTEED TO CREATE A POSITIVE CHANGE - suitable for women and men and as a gift idea. Use the planner daily to stay motivated, accountable and committed to a healthier lifestyle.
